title: 684 56 "Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!"Transliteration: "Dai Shūketsu! Rufi to Kyōaku Senshi Gundan" (Japanese:大集結！ルフィと凶悪戦士軍団) Ayako Hiraike Jin Tanaka March 15, 2015(2015-03-15) September 8, 2024
transformers_text: 684 56 Gathering into a Powerful Front Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors Transliteration Dai Sh ke tsu Ru fi to Ky aku Senshi Gund an Japanese Aya ko Hira ike J in Tanaka March 15 2015 2015 03 15 September 8 2024 Zoro emerges from the rubble finding Luffy and Law unharmed by the punch Cavendish comes in and shows gratitude to the Straw Hats for saving him but talks about how he will kill Do flamingo Luffy's group walks away and gets chased by the bounty hunters and Chin jao catches up to Luffy to thank him Most of the other strong Colosseum competitors find Luffy's group and argue over who will kill Do flamingo Their fight against Pica begins as Luffy tries to run away from the rest of the Colosseum competitors Pica sees Luffy and throws a punch with his huge stone arm but Chin jao and Eliza bello II respond by using Drill Dragon Nail and King Punch respectively to destroy Pica's arm
tf_idf_text: gather powerful front luffy group brutal warrior transliteration dai tsu aku senshi gund japanese aya hira ike tanaka march september zoro emerge rubble find luffy law unharmed punch cavendish come show gratitude straw hat save talk kill flamingo luffys group walk away get chased bounty hunter chin jao catch luffy thank strong colosseum competitor find luffys group argue kill flamingo fight pica begin luffy try run away rest colosseum competitor pica see luffy throw punch huge stone arm chin jao eliza bello respond use drill dragon nail king punch respectively destroy pica arm
